[hackerrank solution] Mini-Max Sum

August 03, 2017

solution

function main() {
    arr = readLine().split(' ');
    arr = arr.map(Number);
    arr.sort()
  
    var sum = arr.reduce(function(sum,num){
      return sum + num
    },0)
    
    console.log((sum-arr[arr.length-1])+' '+(sum-arr[0]))
  
}
태그
hackerrank solution

Based on orderedlist's theme
